original_title: Stretch of Low-Level Road to remain closed this weekend
original_body_lines: A stretch of the Low-Level Road will be out of bounds for vehicular movement this weekend, the National Water Supply & Drainage Board (NWSDB) said today (Jan.05).
Accordingly, the road will remain closed from Wellampitiya to Kotikawatta between 10:00 p.m. tomorrow (Jan.06) and 5:00 p.m. on Sunday (Jan.07).
The temporary road closure was attributed to the essential maintenance of the water supply line.
